name: DeckMaster (itch)
description:
DeckMaster: A unique card game about synergizing cards and overpowering your opponents

What is DeckMaster?  DeckMaster is a card game, like any other, with one unique twist: unlike most card games, where cards have an individual action (such as "deal 5 damage to your opponent"), cards instead have parts of actions which can be combined together to create effects (such as "deal ____ damage to your opponent" and "5").

This on its own makes DeckMaster quite unique in how it works, but the addition of spirit cards add more potential strength to plays, allowing you to create further edits to how cards work, by adding to a number card, multiplying its effect strength, or making its effects piercing to further damage your opponent.

DeckMaster is a game with a low skill entry level and an extremely high skill ceiling. You will always be learning something new.

Please keep in mind that DeckMaster is in beta. I'm updating it constantly, but bugs are still to be expected. If you find anything, you can contact me anywhere and I'll try to get it fixed ASAP!
